co.cask.coopr.scheduler
Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
  com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService
      co.cask.coopr.scheduler.Scheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.common.util.concurrent.Service
public class Scheduler
extends com.google.common.util.concurrent.AbstractIdleService

Runs the different schedulers for solving cluster layouts and planning and coordinating cluster jobs. Leader election is run so that only a single server in a server cluster will be running these schedulers at any given time, where a server cluster is defined as all servers using the same zookeeper quorum.
